segments.text: Excuse me , I ordered the well-done steak , but this one is so tough .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sir , I think I have made a mistake . I will take it back to the kitchen right now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you should be more careful next time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , sir . I'm really so sorry about that .
segments.speaker: S2
